Entry.JapaneseText: エトス
Entry.EnglishText: Ethos

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
開かない……？
Entry.EnglishText: It's not opening...?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>？
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>, are you in here?

Entry.JapaneseText: いるんでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Please answer me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何イジけてるの！？ 思い通りにいかないって 言われたから？
Entry.EnglishText: What's up with you all of a sudden!? You're acting like a huge thickhead! Weren't you the one that said we'd not only do things for our own?

Entry.JapaneseText: 勝手に想像して、期待して。 それが全部裏切られたから？
Entry.EnglishText: To not think only of yourself and to not carry over everything by yourself even when things don't go as planned...Will you betray your own beliefs?

Entry.JapaneseText: 外に出る時、あんなに はしゃいでたくせに。 バカみたい
Entry.EnglishText: When you finally got to see the outside world you were so happy. Now that you know what's out there you lock yourself? You look like an i<Dio>t, <Dio>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、<Mel>、 きみ、そんなこと……
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>...I think you've gone too far...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうせバカだよ！ ダメダメだよ、オレ……！
Entry.EnglishText: She's right! I'm a huge i<Dio>t! I can't do anything right...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大切なエレメンツポットを 壊すし、<Cless>さんの代わりも ちゃんとできない
Entry.EnglishText: They told me to take care of the Elements' Pot and I broke it... Mister <Cless> trusted me with his job and I failed to help him...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>が魔物に襲われた時も すぐ動けなかった
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever <Mel>'s in danger I can't do anything to protect her!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなこと…… 気にしてたんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: You've been... bottling up all these feelings, haven't you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: いくら色々夢見ても、 結局、全部思い通りなんて いかないんだろ！？
Entry.EnglishText: Even if I could finally see the world nothing ever has turned the way I wanted it to...

Entry.JapaneseText: バジルさんだけじゃない…… <Claus>さんも、 <Cless>さんも<Mint>さんも……
Entry.EnglishText: I've failed Mister Basil...and <Claus>...and Mister <Cless> and Miss <Mint>...

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなんなら、 オレ、外なんて 出るんじゃなかった
Entry.EnglishText: I-I don't want to see what's out there anymore! All I try to do goes wrong!

Entry.JapaneseText: もういい。『虹輪』は わたしひとりでなんとかする
Entry.EnglishText: Fine. I don't need your negativity. I'll go stop the Prism Ring alone.

Entry.JapaneseText: 勝手にひとりでいじけて、 とじこもって、ヤドカリに なっちゃえばいいんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: You can now do all you want and everything will turn exactly as you wanted. Stay safe inside the house, you hermit!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ちょっと、待って……！
Entry.EnglishText: W-wait <Mel>!
